title: Need a Riot Members help again!
body: i logged out becasue i was disconnected from chat then went to log back on and it is saying my password is wrong. i sent tickets and emails but frankly not having a live support team is again ur weakness RITO My main is Welcometothejg and the email to it is no longer exsisting so i cant do a password recovery or even figure out whats wrong with the account. i cant even log onto the forms on my main yet i can use this perma banned account to talk of the forms just fine. id like some help as seeign the ranked season will be ending soon and i want to hit plat quick so i can get my 3v3s to gold to get al lthe rewards

replies.body: We have live chat regularly as well as the ticketing system, but rest easy either way we will be able to look into this!  If you have a ticket number I can check on the status for you.
